title: Add “Site Soundtrack” label above YouTube Music links

requirements.summary: Add a neon lime green “Site Soundtrack.” label directly above the existing YouTube Music access hyperlinks in the hero soundtrack section.
acceptanceCriteria: The text "Site Soundtrack" appears immediately above the existing YouTube Music access hyperlinks (no other content inserted between them).
The label uses a medium-sized font (e.g., Tailwind `text-lg` or `text-xl`) and is visually distinct from surrounding text.
The label text color is neon lime green (e.g., Tailwind `text-[#39FF14]` or an equivalent neon-lime value) and renders correctly in the app theme(s).
No other copy is changed and the YouTube Music hyperlinks continue to function as before.

file_operations.description: In the existing “Play Soundtrack Section” container (the section that renders the three YouTube links), insert a single-line label element with exact text "Site Soundtrack." directly above the hyperlink grid; style it with a medium font size (e.g., Tailwind text-lg/text-xl) and a rich neon lime green color (e.g., Tailwind text-[#39FF14]) without changing any link URLs or surrounding layout beyond the label.
